member.name: D3D12_DISPATCH_ARGUMENTS
member.summary: Describes dispatch parameters, for use by the compute shader.

member.name: D3D12_DISPATCH_ARGUMENTS.ThreadGroupCountX
member.summary: The size, in thread groups, of the x-dimension of the thread-group grid.

member.name: D3D12_DISPATCH_ARGUMENTS.ThreadGroupCountY
member.summary: The size, in thread groups, of the y-dimension of the thread-group grid.

member.name: D3D12_DISPATCH_ARGUMENTS.ThreadGroupCountZ
member.summary: The size, in thread groups, of the z-dimension of the thread-group grid.
